pages.text: This powerful step up from the Enchanting Table costs more XP to use but allows you to pick and choose what enchantments you will place on something$(br2)It must be surrounded by bookshelves in much the same fashion as a normal bookshelf - but can be boosted by up to 30 bookshelves$(br2)

pages.title: Enchantment Infuser
pages.text: It is expensive; but can be upgraded to be more powerful and cheaper using Netherite
